body: <#e5e5e5>You seed good fortune and fate with the elaborate chords of your tune.
<white>You carefully stretch your limbs, allowing the muscles to become loose.
<#cdcd00><#ffffff>An arcane snowstorm veils the area with bone-biting, impenetrable white. <white>

<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="east"east/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="northwest"northwest/SEND/COLOR, and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="south"south/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<white>You currently walk in divine grace and may neither be harmed nor harm another. To leave this state of protection, you may REJECT GRACE.
<white>You currently walk in divine grace and may neither be harmed nor harm another. To leave this state of protection, you may REJECT GRACE.
<white>The flow of destiny favours you as your song ends with a single strident note.
<white>You cry aloud your rejection of divine grace, and leave the protection of the Divinities.
<#e5e5e5>Light weaves itself within your free hand, forming a sharp anelace that you grip tightly.
<white>An onyx and garnet ring glimmers faintly, the gemstone upon it aiding you.
<white>You take a long drag off your pipe filled with reishi.
<#e5e5e5>You seed good fortune and fate with the elaborate chords of your tune.
<white>Nawan is now one of your enemies.
<white>Your music already produces discord in those who listen.

<white>Your fingers begin to trail with light.
<white>You feel an aura of rebounding surround you.

<white>The shrunken head in your inventory sneezes violently.
<#00cd00>You have 10 items in the <#cdcd00>Various Tools<white> category.
<white>You have <#00cdcd>82<white> types of items in the cache.
<white>A sprawling venantium cuff tinges red as it reveals Nawan trying to locate you.
<white>Nawan's attack rebounds off your magical shield.
<white>Nawan takes a long drag off his pipe filled with reishi.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;parry head;;secure right;;unwield right;;weave globes Nawan
<white>You will now attempt to parry attacks to your head.
<white>You cease to wield a sharp anelace in your right hand, securing it conveniently on a black leather weaponbelt of the wolf of cloaking.
<white>Your aggressive action causes the nearly invisible magical shield around you to fade away.
<#e5e5e5>With a snap of your fingers, three illusionary globes rise up from the ground and begin to spin around Nawan.
<white>An onyx and garnet ring glimmers faintly, the gem absorbing the fatigue completely.
<white>You take a long drag off your pipe filled with reishi.
<#e5e5e5>With a flourish, a circle of glowing runes begins to form around Nawan, gently spinning around him in a pattern.
<#e5e5e5>An onyx and garnet ring glimmers faintly, the gemstone upon it aiding you.
<#e5e5e5>Nawan reaches out to touch you, and a cold, sickly sensation spreads from the point of contact.
<white>When you can act: stand;;quickwield left 279483;;hiltblow Nawan
<white>You fluidly swap a sharp anelace with a sweeping, polished falchion in your left hand.
<#e5e5e5>You spin backward and slam the hilt of a sweeping, polished falchion into Nawan's stomach.
<#e5e5e5>Nawan's stomach gurgles miserably under the blow.
<white>Nawan touches a tree of life tattoo.
<white>You discern that Nawan has cured the effects of misery.
<white>An atramentous puzzle cube silently shimmers into view.
<white>When you can act: stand;;needle Nawan digitalis
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<white>You remove 1 needle, bringing the total in the cache to 584.
<#e5e5e5>You fling a thin needle at Nawan, piercing his skin with digitalis on its tip.
<white>Your fingers begin to trail with light.

<white>Nawan flips through a small codex and opens it before him.
<#e5e5e5>Nawan points imperiously toward you, and you feel your sense of time crumbling.
<white>You suddenly perceive the vague outline of an aura of rebounding around Nawan.

<#e5e5e5>Pulsing ominously, the weapon floods Nawan's chest with an array of inverted light.
<white>You take a long drag off your pipe filled with reishi.
<white>A sharp anelace breaks into shimmering light in your hands as it crumbles apart.
<white>Nawan appears flushed and somewhat unsteady on his feet.
<white>The shifting runes within the band around Nawan capture his attention.
<white>A look of extreme focus crosses the face of Nawan.
<#e5e5e5>Nawan constructs a matrix from the higher geometries, encircling you within.

<#e5e5e5>You discern that a layer of curare has rubbed off your weapon.
<#e5e5e5>Nawan frowns as he struggles with numbed motion.
<white>You rub some larkspur on a sweeping, polished falchion.

<white>Tongue parched, you feel a desperate craving for a curative - any curative.

<white>You focus your mind intently on curing your mental maladies.

<white>The loom of time spins its threads around you, binding you to this moment.
<#e5e5e5>You feel Nawan's eyes on you. Slowly, your mind begins to fill with gibberish. Spots swim before your eyes.

<white>Aaaahhh. No one is out to get you after all.
<white>When you can act: stand;;weave barbs Nawan
<white>You discern that Nawan has cured the effects of crippled left leg.
<white>You cannot contain the convulsions in your stomach any longer and double over, retching violently.
<white>Your sheath glimmers into view and absorbs the blow.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<#e5e5e5>With a wave, you shatter one of the globes into thin barbs that quickly perforate Nawan in a hail of light.
<#e5e5e5>The searing globe rattles Nawan's thoughts as it spins out of existence.
<#e5e5e5>An onyx and garnet ring glimmers faintly, the gemstone upon it aiding you.
<white>Ooh look! A lovely lake. Perhaps you'll dive in!

<white>You remove 1 crackshot, bringing the total in the cache to 134.
<#e5e5e5>Taking a small pellet within your hand, you quickly fling it towards Nawan, which bursts into disorienting sound.
<white>The loom of time spins its threads around you, binding you to this moment.
<white>With the heel of your palm, you smack yourself upside the head.
<white>Your mind sharpens as the inner cogs begin to whirl.
<white>You remove 1 steroid, bringing the total in the cache to 1567.
<white>Shadow knifes through you, weakening your immunity against the outside world.
<#e5e5e5>Nawan shifts his stance, seeming to become more nimble on his feet.
<#e5e5e5>An atramentous puzzle cube twists over once, revealing the Hex upon it.
<#e5e5e5>Lunging in, Nawan stabs you with a Spirean-issue gladius.
<#e5e5e5>You jerk your body to the side, lessening the blow.
<#e5e5e5>Your sheath glimmers into view and absorbs the blow.
<#e5e5e5>A prickly stinging overwhelms your body, fading away into numbness.
<white>Micene has escaped Slaver's Isle and entered the realm of Aetolia.
<white>You feel an aura of rebounding surround you.
<white>You cringe as a dark red rash spreads painfully across your skin.
<white>Sharp straight lines form the Square as they encapsule your thoughts.
<white>You remove 1 depressant, bringing the total in the cache to 1378.
<white>When you can act: stand;;bravado Nawan curare
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<#e5e5e5>You steel yourself, swinging a sweeping, polished falchion into Nawan while spurning injury.
<#e5e5e5>You discern that a layer of curare has rubbed off your weapon.
<#e5e5e5>Nawan frowns as he struggles with numbed motion.
<#e5e5e5>Sanity returns to you and you are no longer demented.
<white>You take a long drag off your pipe filled with reishi.
<white>Your mind is able to focus once again.
<white>You discern that Nawan has cured the effects of perplexed.
<white>You cannot contain the convulsions in your stomach any longer and double over, retching violently.
<white>You focus your mind intently on curing your mental maladies.

<#e5e5e5>In an instant, blinding agony courses through your body as it to begins unravel from the bones outward - your guts and your frame quickly reduced to a formless pink mist. Everything goes black as your eyes dissolve, and then there is nothing else.
<#e5e5e5>You were afflicted by patterns, lemniscate (x4), dizziness, faintness, masochism, vomiting, allergies (x1), and paresis.
